class.name: EditorSceneImporterAssetImport
class.brief_description: This is a multi-format 3d asset importer.
class.description:
This is a multi-format 3d asset importer.
Use these FBX export settings from Autodesk Maya. [codeblock] * Smoothing Groups * Smooth Mesh * Bake Animation * Resample All * Deformed Models * Skins * Blend Shapes * Curve Filters * Constant Key Reducer * Auto Tangents Only * DO NOT CHECK Constraints (Will Break File) * DO NOT CHECK Embed Media * Units: Centimeters * Up Axis: Y * Binary format in FBX 2013 [/codeblock]
